name: Reactor Tech²
description:
Become the main power engineer of the world - the builder of the most powerful power plant that feeds the whole world! You have to build your own power plant, research new technologies and make the most successful power company in 100 gaming years.

ARCHITECTURE

  • Power units
    Build up to four power units in your power plant to equip them with boilers, turbines and other useful parts.
  • Power storage and power lines
    Save the generated power in case of repairs or unexpected increases in exports, and also use the power lines to distribute the power within the power plant and all the way to the end consumer.
  • Water pumping stations and pipelines
    Install a water pumping station to extract water and extend the piping to power units to operate the boilers.

FINE ADJUSTMENT

  • Engineering
    The game will give you the opportunity to independently equip each power unit with using the engineering menu, which includes 64 slots for installation with five types of parts to choose from.
  • Control
    Use the control panel to change the output of boilers, heat exchangers, neutron reflectors and water supply.
  • Fuel
    You will have 12 types of fuel to choose from, each of which will be suitable for its type of boiler: solid fuel, liquid fuel and nuclear.

CAMPAIGN

  • Competition
    Other power companies will play against you. You have to turn your company into the very first in popularity in 100 gaming years.
  • Technology
    Research new technologies will open you up to new engineering details, resources, power units and various useful opportunities.
